attributes.action: British Rights and Benefits MUST change
attributes.additional_details:
CHANGES NEEDED...

You must not have ANY criminal backgrounds and IF immigrants get involved in ANY criminal activities whilst in the UK they must be deported immediately.

You must work or must be seen to be trying to look for work to get access to ANY benefits.

You cannot transfer benefit funding abroad.

You must pay tax on your benefits if you are not from or were not born in the UK.

Immigrants should NOT get better benefits or rights than UK citizens.

Houses should NOT be given to immigrant familes.

Immigrants MUST speak fluent english and declined  entry if they cannot. ENGLISH in the UK only.

These should be used to help the elderly and single parent families plus FIRST TIME BUYERS.
